title: Rito condoning trolling behaviour this season
body:
Rito.
Humor me.
You say this season (and last), you're cracking down in trolls, yet without fail, most of the games you've given me, since starting this season, a majority of trolls.
Despite reports, blocking and dodging so I don't get them, you still without fail, manage to give them to me.
You then, in turn, turn around and say you punish this behavior (nice joke by the way) by giving them skins and champs at the end of events or whenever. 
On top of that, you punish players who carry and don't intentionally feed or troll with queue restrictions and chat restrictions. 
I'm at the point of wondering what runs through the system and your minds to think this is perfectly fine and acceptable. 
If you guys honestly believe (and this season has backed this greatly) that its okay to let people troll and intentionally feed and reward that behavior then punish people who can carry (usually as a support for me), I suggest taking a long, hard look at your game, company and community. 
~Sincerely, a extremely pissed off community member who you seem to give all the trolls to.

replies.body:
Hello Blaster Joker  ( cool name btw)

There is definitely a system in place that takes care of this.
While there may be a lot of trolls out there, you probabley wont get the same troll 2 times over. 

Riot will eventually give them harsher punishments untill they banish them from the game.

Unfortunately, I do get them multiple times in a row. Or multiple times over a few weeks.
If there honestly is a system, it's clearly not working and should be revised. 

I can only tolerate the people in the after game lobby so long while reporting before I would want to punch one in the face.

Hey all,

Please don't submit a support ticket for feedback on the game and/or any of the systems in place, you will just be redirected to post on the boards.

The support team is backed up enough as it is right now, please use the boards to provide feedback on the game.

On the subject of "Gang Reporting" see [this](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/11/2016-season-update.html#red1) post by Riot Lyte. (Under the dynamic groups heading)

>in a Premade 4 situation, your reports are just as powerful as the group, so if they are showing toxic behaviors at all, your single report can have a meaningful impact and trigger a punishment. We believe measures like this will help balance out this specific scenario to be less negative. "

http://ci.memecdn.com/52/7444052.jpg
That seems fitting.
At the moment, i'm seeing reports do nothing expect bring me more and more trolls. The team I just had had the firm belief that feeding wins games.

Last night I had people with the belief that if your team has multiple afks, they would win. 
Alll of them been reported and im still getting them.

Please do continue to report these players yourself in the post-game screen as this is the best thing to do, be as detailed as possible in the report.

If you forget to report a player or wish to submit further evidence with a report then you may [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will forward the information to the correct team.
People can feed bc they are laned vs a smurf. You can't take that out on someone since it's supposed to happen.
